resources.string: In automatic irrigation, the plant will be irrigated as soon as soil moisture measured falls beyond threshold value.
In scheduled irrigation, the plant will be irrigated based on start and end time. Please use time format HH:MM
In sunlight exposure control, the sun shade will be activated if the plant sunlight exposure exceeds set limit
Without sunlight exposure control, the sun shade will be retracted and plant will be exposed to sunlight at all times.
Here you can edit the parameter limits for sensors.
